dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Class SWTGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.SWTGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.internal.ISWTWidgetElement, ISWTWidget, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable

    public class SWTGroup
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
implements ISWTWidget, dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.internal.ISWTWidgetElement
    This standard widget represents a group that layouts other widgets. A group can be created with the following code snippet: 
     WidgetFactory factory = getWidgetFactory();
 factory.createGroup(parent, "GroupWidgetId", WidgetFactory.GroupLayout.HORIZONTAL);
 factory.createGroup(parent,
                     "GroupWidgetId",
                     WidgetFactory.GroupDecoration.TITLE,
                     WidgetFactory.GroupLayout.HORIZONTAL,
                     "My Group");

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b
